name: Power Moto: Police Stunt
description:
Power Moto: Police Stunt is a fun and exciting open world police motorbike driving bike simulator where you, the best police bike officer, control a super fast police bike

Power Moto: Police Stunt FEATURES:
 - Easy to learn Bike controls, both touch and tilt controls  
- Realistic police motorbike physics 
- Massive real life city map environments with traffic
 - Nitrous/Nitro Button for extra bike speed 
- Real world environments with city area
